abilities.name: Biotic Rifle
abilities.description: The Biotic Rifle shoots darts that will heal allied heroes or apply 0.9 second damage-over-time (DOT) to enemy units. The dart is a fast moving projectile if fired from the hip, and a hitscan shot if firing while scoped. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Biotic Rifle (Scope)
abilities.description: She can use the rifle’s scope to zoom in on targets and make highly accurate shots. The dart is a fast moving projectile if fired from the hip, and a hitscan shot if firing while scoped. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Sleep Dart
abilities.description: After a short delay, Ana fires a fast moving dart from her sidearm. An enemy hit is stunned for a few seconds, but the effect is immediately broken if the target takes damage.

abilities.name: Biotic Grenade
abilities.description: Ana tosses a biotic bomb that deals damage to enemies and heals allies in a small area of effect. Affected allies briefly receive increased healing from all sources, while enemies caught in the blast cannot be healed for a few moments.

abilities.name: Nano Boost
abilities.description: After Ana hits one of her allies with a combat boost, they deal more damage and take less damage from enemies’ attacks.
